enum: The individual is listed as an owner of the parcel if she/he has a legal document under her/his name in the households where at least one member has cultivated land.
Self-reported ownership is used for the estimates
Share of women among owners or rights-bearers of agricultural land, by type of tenure [5.a.1]
Proportion of total agricultural population with ownership or secure rights over agricultural land [5.a.1]
The individual is listed as an owner of the parcel if she/he has a legal document under her/his name in the households where at least one member has cultivated land.
Self-reported ownership is used for the estimates

name: 5-a-1
title: (a) Proportion of total agricultural population with ownership or secure rights over agricultural land, by sex; and (b) share of women among owners or rights-bearers of agricultural land, by type of tenure
